item.title: How To Flow Text In Shell
item.description: This snippet flows some text in your shell. It use in the last of presentation or something. #!/bin/bash CMD_NAME=`basename $0` SPACE=`tput cols` FILE_NAME= if [ $# -ne 1 ]; then echo "USAGE: $CMD_NAMEfile_name" exit 1 fi # Trapping signals trap 'tput smam; exit 1' 1 2 3 15 FILE_NAME=$1 while [ $SPACE -gt 0 ]; do while IFS='' read LINE do [[ $SPACE > 0 ]] && printf "%${SPACE}s" ' ' tput rmam; printf "%s\n" "$LINE" done < $FILE_NAME SPACE=$(( SPACE - 1 )) sleep 0.
